name: James Brian
description: I am a kind, compassionate, intelligent, wonderful, generous, self-assured, humble, outgoing, who can be quite charming, a bit crazy, often silly…lol. I love laughter to the extremes and will go the distance to put a welcome smile on your face or to hear the giggle that you own. I love nature, the mountains, oceans, lakes and rivers, Trees, wild flowers and all the changes it brings each season. I enjoy fishing and many other outdoor activities. I receive pleasure and satisfaction from precious observations and participation in life’s wonderful creations. I simply like everything…
